title: Inmate assaults 2 Central Prison employees, officials say

organizations.name: north carolina department of public safety

text:
Inmate assaults 2 Central Prison employees, officials say 
Posted 38 minutes ago Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Find News Near Me 
Raleigh, N.C. â€” An inmate assaulted two Central Prison employees late Friday night, sending the inmate and both workers to the hospital to be treated, officials said. 
The assault happened around 11 p.m. at the prison in Raleigh, according to the North Carolina Department of Public Safety. The inmate fought and punched the employees. 
All three people were treated by prison medical staff before being taken to the hospital. 
The identity of the inmate was not released. Credits
